00093 class SquaredError : virtual public ModelInterface {
00094  public:

00096 //===========================================================================
00122   double error(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &out) {
00123     double se = 0;
00124     if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00125       Array<double> output(out.dim(0));
00126       model(in, output);
00127       for(unsigned c = 0; c < out.dim(0); c++) {
00128         se += (out(c) - output(c)) * (out(c) - output(c));
00129       }
00130     } else {
00131       Array<double> output(out.dim(1));
00132       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00133         model(in[pattern], output);
00134         for(unsigned c = 0; c < out.dim(1); c++) {
00135           se += (out(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (out(pattern, c) - output(c));
00136         }
00137       }
00138     }
00139     return se;
00140   }
00141 
00142 //===========================================================================
00179   double derror(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &out, bool returnError = true) {
00180     dedw = 0;
00181     double se = 0;
00182     if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00183       Array<double> output(out.dim(0));
00184       dmodel(in, output);
00185       for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++) {
00186         if (returnError)
00187           se += (out(c) - output(c)) * (out(c) - output(c));
00188         for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00189           dedw(i) -= (out(c) - output(c)) * dmdw(c, i);
00190       }
00191       for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++) dedw(i) *= 2;
00192     } else {
00193       Array<double> output(out.dim(1));
00194       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < in.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00195         dmodel(in[pattern], output);
00196         for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++) {
00197           if(returnError)
00198             se += (out(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (out(pattern, c) - output(c));
00199           for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00200             dedw(i) -= (out(pattern, c) - output(c)) * dmdw(c, i);
00201         }
00202       }
00203       for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++) dedw(i) *= 2;
00204     }
00205     if (!returnError)
00206       se = -1;
00207     return se;
00208   }
00209 };
